content: this easy crochet blanket pattern features wavy stripes that are made with single and double_crochet stitches spike stitches every 4th row add subtle texture to accentuate the pattern even further made with caron anniversary cakes soothing colors appear as you stitch so there are no pesky ends to weave in when you re done with over 1 000 yards per ball you only need 2 cakes to stitch this generously sized blanket replicate the designer s version featuring calming tones or choose a more vivid color to coordinate with your own décor yarn for model caron® anniversary cakes™ 35 3 oz/1000 g 1061 yds/970 m blueberry birthday 20002 2 balls video tutorial https //www youtube com/watch v=ehcqmajv3bm
